tldr: Auto-discover and track internal project plans (not delegated by orchestrator) by scanning coderef/working/*/plan.json periodically and registering them as 'internal' workorders in workorders.json.
description: Track plan.json and workorders that originate inside projects without orchestrator involvement. Projects create their own plans - orchestrator should still be able to discover and track them.
problem: Some work starts inside projects directly (not delegated from orchestrator). These plans exist but aren't tracked in workorders.json.

solution.discovery: Orchestrator scans all project coderef/working/*/plan.json periodically
solution.registration: If plan.json exists without matching workorder, auto-register it
solution.tracking: Add to workorders.json with type: 'internal' to distinguish from delegated work

workflow: 2. Finds plan.json files not in workorders.json
